document.full_text: novak djokovic's route to a maiden title at roland garros and the world number one ranking could be a hazardous one following friday's draw for the french open which starts on sunday.
document.title: djokovic faces hazardous route at french open
lines_and_colors: novak djokovic's route to a maiden title at roland garros and the world number one ranking could be a hazardous one following friday's draw for the french open which starts on sunday.
